## Moving on with an interactive table

```{r}
library(DT)
```

## A moving figure, *interactive figure* or movie

```{r}
#| fig-width: 12
#| fig-height: 6

library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

plot <- ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(plot)

```

This equation is why the previous relationship made perfect sense: 

\newline

\
\begin{array}{rl}
 gay + gay = relationship
\\ straight + straight = relationship \\ \hline
2(gay) + 2(straight) = 2 (relationship) \\ \hline
gay + straight = relationship.
